envy.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to wish that you had someone else’s possessions, abilities etc
envy.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: I really envy you and Ian, you seem so happy together.
She has a lifestyle which most people would envy.
He envied Rosalind her youth and strength.
envy.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: the feeling of wanting something that someone else has
envy.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: She could see that all the other girls were green with envy  (=feeling a lot of envy).
I felt a twinge of envy when I saw them together.
He watched the others with envy.
his envy of the young man’s success
